name: Jacob's Ladder
description:
Controls:

Left click a spool to select it.
Select two spools to drag the string from the first to the second and make a walkable string bridge!
There is a string counter in the bottom right corner indicating how many string bridges you may create in a level.
Right click a string bridge to remove it.
WASD to move, space to jump, W to enter doors at the end of the level.

Jacob's Ladder is a Unity2D game made in 12 hours at the Cincinnati Game Developer Association's October game jam.
